pr_title: chore: set auto.offset.reset to none for command topic consumer

timeline.message: chore: set auto.offset.reset to none for command topic consumer

timeline.bodyText: is there a constant somewhere for this?
timeline.author: agavra
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -95,6 +95,10 @@ public static CommandStore create(
           ConsumerConfig.ISOLATION_LEVEL_CONFIG,
           IsolationLevel.READ_COMMITTED.toString().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT)
       );
+      kafkaConsumerProperties.put(
+          ConsumerConfig.AUTO_OFFSET_RESET_CONFIG,
+          "none"

replies.bodyText:
I don't really think so. https://kafka.apache.org/26/javadoc/constant-values.html
The closest thing is StreamsConfig. NO_OPTIMIZATION which is none but that doesn't really make sense here.
replies.author: stevenpyzhang
